ValidationRule.description: If Competency Criteria Name has Approved Business Plan then the Compentency Critieria Value can only be “Y” or “N”
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Certification_Criteria_Name__c , "Approved Business Plan") , NOT(OR(Certification_Criteria_Value__c = "Y", Certification_Criteria_Value__c ="N"))) ,true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter Y for Yes and N for No
